ingredients.ingredient: 1 sweet onion, sliced and separated into rings

cookingTips: Use the bed of onions to keep the chicken elevated and cook evenly
The chicken will be extremely tender and easy to shred after cooking
Reserve pan juices mixed with salsa for dipping or serving over rice
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Whole chickens are economical and versatile. Have you cooked a whole chicken in a slow cooker before?
